title: yay, hehe
body: <!-- id=196--><!-- isMature=1 -->i got my free pocket pc today.  ViewSonic V37, free with our MSDN.  totally awesome.  i went to pocketpc.com to find cool stuff to put on it and there's <A HREF="http://www.microsoft.com/windowsmobile/products/pocketpc/images/home_ppc.jpg">an image</A> right on the ms home page.  does ms really need to resort to pictures of large breasted women wearing tight shirts (look at the button that is barely holding it together)?  maybe they just assume that their audience is 16-30 year old men and lesbians.  maybe i've just got boobs on the brain or something.
bodyArticleHtml:
2003-07-14

yay, hehe
